text: "Comedytime Saturday" is the official branding for a one-hour programming block in the 2011-12 television season on CBS. It airs reruns of shows on Thursdays and Mondays on CBS. How to Be a Gentleman was moved on this block when episodes got burned off, and Rules of Engagement moved to its timeslot (Thursdays at 8:30 PM). ==References== Category:Television programs
title: Comedytime Saturday
